attributes.action: dog torture and killing for meat in china
attributes.additional_details:
China subjects inhumane and barbaric torture to dogs, they hang them, stab them, torture and kill them in front of other dogs to raise fear - which is supposed to make the meat taste better!!!

This has to be stopped. We are an animal loving nation, amongst many others, we cannot stand by and let this happen.

Please make representations to the Chinese Government to outlaw the barbaric behaviour.

Watch the video if you dare (graphic!): http://www.causes.com/actions/1665543?fb_action_ids=480127652009480&fb_action_types=causes%3Asign&fb_source=other_multiline&action_object_map=%7B%22480127652009480%22%3A10150913656901945%7D&action_type_map=%7B%22480127652009480%22%3A%22causes%3Asign%22%7D&action_ref_map
